%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, DateType, DecimalType
##Read customer data 
customerschema = StructType([
   StructField("custid", IntegerType(), True),
   StructField("firstname", StringType(), True),
   StructField("lastname", StringType(), True),
   StructField("gender", StringType(), True)])

#customerschema= ['custid','firstname','lastname','gender']
dfcustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapsecontainer1@synapsedlake1.dfs.core.windows.net/data-curated-silver/customer/customer*'
        ,format='parquet'
        ,schema=customerschema
        #,header=True
        )
dfcustomer.show()

##Read product data 
productschema = StructType([
   StructField("productid", IntegerType(), True),
   StructField("productname", StringType(), True),
   StructField("productcategory", StringType(), True)])

dfproduct = spark.read.load('abfss://synapsecontainer1@synapsedlake1.dfs.core.windows.net/data-curated-silver/product/products*'
        ,format='parquet'
        ,schema=productschema
        ,header=True)
display(dfproduct.limit(5))

dfproduct.show()

##Read sales data 
salesschema = StructType([
   StructField("salesid", IntegerType(), True),
   StructField("custid", IntegerType(), True),
   StructField("productid", IntegerType(), True),
      StructField("quantity", IntegerType(), True),
   StructField("saledate", DateType(), True),
      StructField("revenue", DecimalType(), True)])
dfsales = spark.read.load('abfss://synapsecontainer1@synapsedlake1.dfs.core.windows.net/data-curated-silver/sales/sales*'
        ,format='parquet'
        ,schema=salesschema
        )
display(dfsales.limit(5))
